name: All India Institute of Medical Sciences, Delhi
desc: AIIMS Delhi stands as a pinnacle of medical education and research in India. Located in New Delhi, it offers world-class medical facilities and nurtures future healthcare professionals with comprehensive training and education.

name: Post Graduate Institute of Medical Education and Research
desc: PGIMER Chandigarh is a renowned medical institution known for its academic excellence and patient care. Situated in Chandigarh, it offers advanced medical training and cutting-edge research opportunities.

name: Christian Medical College
desc: CMC Vellore, a premier medical institute in Tamil Nadu, is committed to providing holistic healthcare and medical education. With a rich heritage of service, it continues to produce skilled healthcare professionals.

name: National Institute of Mental Health & Neuro Sciences, Bangalore
desc: NIMHANS Bangalore, a leading institute in mental health and neurosciences, offers cutting-edge research and clinical services. Located in Bangalore, Karnataka, it strives to address the mental health needs of the nation.

name: Banaras Hindu University
desc: BHU Varanasi, steeped in tradition and excellence, is a renowned hub for medical education and research. Situated in Varanasi, Uttar Pradesh, it continues to produce competent healthcare professionals.

name: Jawaharlal Institute of Post Graduate Medical Education & Research
desc: JIPMER Puducherry is a premier medical institution known for its academic rigor and patient care. Situated in Puducherry, it offers comprehensive medical education and fosters cutting-edge research.

name: Sanjay Gandhi Postgraduate Institute of Medical Sciences
desc: SGPGI Lucknow is a leading medical institute known for its specialized healthcare services and research. Situated in Lucknow, Uttar Pradesh, it continues to contribute significantly to the field of medicine.

name: Amrita Vishwa Vidyapeetham
desc: Amrita Vishwa Vidyapeetham, located in Coimbatore, Tamil Nadu, is a multidisciplinary institution known for its excellence in medical education and research. With state-of-the-art facilities, it provides a conducive environment for holistic learning.

name: Sree Chitra Tirunal Institute for Medical Sciences and Technology, Thiruvananthapuram
desc: SCTIMST Thiruvananthapuram is a pioneer in medical research and technology development. Situated in Kerala, it offers advanced healthcare solutions and innovative medical education programs.

name: Kasturba Medical College, Manipal
desc: KMC Manipal, located in Manipal, Karnataka, is a premier medical institution known for its academic excellence and global outlook. With a focus on holistic development, it prepares students to excel in the field of medicine.
